channel.title: Jordan on Yﾄ》rﾄ［aya
channel.description: Recent content in Jordan on Yﾄ》rﾄ［aya

item.title: Dead Sea : World's Largest Outdoor Spa
item.description: You went to Jordan and you did not go to the Dead Sea? I did not want to hear this. Also I had heard so much about the Dead Sea in school. The Dead Sea is a unique place where the salt content is so high that you cannot sink. I had to experience this. On our last leg of journey from Wadi Rum to Madaba, we wanted to cover the Dead Sea.

item.title: Walking the Wadi Rum, Jordan
item.description: How far would one have to drive out to actually get somewhere? Strange were my thoughts as I stared out of the SUV into the emptiness all around. Did we really have to get anywhere at all? In a desert like Wadi Rum it took only an hour worth of driving to get to a point where one’s source and destination started to look the same and considering we did not have any specific goal it was only logical to rely on our host who was intently driving onwards on a trail that could not have been older than a week.
